description: a(n) = c(1)p(1)+...+c(n)p(n), where c(i) = 1 if a(i-1) >= p(i) and c(i) = -1 if a(i-1) < p(i), for i = 1,...,n (p(i) = primes).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Recam√°n's sequence
prog: (Haskell)a022831 n = a022831_list !! na022831_list = 2 : f 2 (tail a000040_list) where   f x (p:ps) | x' > 0    = x' : f x' ps              | otherwise = xp : f xp ps where x' = x - p; xp = x + p-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 26 2012
